text_block_list.text: ――Katsuragi Ace was training early in the morning today again. Pushing herself to the limits while dripping with sweat.
Seeing Katsuragi Ace like that, wanting to tell her what I had decided, I walked over to her.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……Kuu, haa…… Faster……faster, to get ahead of everyone……!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……Haa……huh? Trainer-san? Haa……mornin', what's up?
Feeling a tightening in my chest, I look straight at Katsuragi Ace. And then I take a deep breath――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Ah……Ooh……? What're you saying all of a sudden? Um, scouting……for real?
I tell Katsuragi Ace about what I've been feeling these past few days.
I couldn't take my eyes off her as she straight-forwardly chased her dream. But more than that, for Katsuragi Ace who speaks of her dreams with pride――
choice_data_list: I want to support you with all I have

text_block_list.text: The Ace of the Uma Musume world. How many obstacles will be on that path? For how long will that path continue on?
When I thought about that, it made me want to walk that path with her. ――The more difficult it was, the more I wanted to be there for her.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……I've been told that my dream is an incredibly long road. That it's unreachable, and might as well be in a different world.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I didn't want to accept it. There was no way I wanted to accept that. Of course, even now……I'm giving my all to show that it's not 『Another World』.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But, even with that……after coming to Tracen Academy, it's still thought of as 『Unreachable』 for me.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: There are times where that feels like a heavy chain holding me down. ……I shook off those feelings and just ran.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: So I wouldn't be caught, serious, with all my strength, until I couldn't breathe. No matter how painful, without stopping my feet.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: With everything……to overturn all of it, I need to hit it with everything I can muster.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……do you have the same resolve that I do?
――Could it be that she ran so recklessly, to burn away everything, including her anxiety?
『That's obvious』『I won't break here』 those words were probably also a way to encourage herself too.
choice_data_list: I want to fulfill your dream

text_block_list.text: Whether it was 『Mine』 or 『Katsuragi Ace's』 dream, I believed both of those paths would lead to the same place.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……In that case, how about we test that out? Until the next mock race, instruct me.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: And there, we'll see if our dreams are suited for each other!
――After that, I spent every day instructing Katsuragi Ace. From early morning until night, we put everything in to it, until we were out of breath.
And finally……the day of the mock race arrived.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you're really nervous aren't you!? I do feel bad for laughing though……haha, you're shaking.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: If you're this nervous about a mock race, then your heart won't be able to handle what comes after! ――Oh, looks like it's starting.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Right, I'm heading out! Make sure you take a good look, Trainer-san!
In today's mock race, there would be a lot of Uma Musume with high expectations. There's no way I wouldn't be nervous. However……!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Finally, the mock race is starting!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: I-is this Katsuragi Ace's strategy!? She's running away, taking an incredible lead!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Will she make it to the end like this!?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……! Make it to the end, they said……!? Haa, of course I will!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa, hahahaa……! Trainer-san, are you watching!? Your instructions……weren't bad at all!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: There's nobody behind me right……!?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: This is my run…… Nobody will be able to catch me!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Destroying all obstacles and common sense…… I'll stand in front……of all those that they admire!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ――The Ace is me!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Just leave it to me!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: First place is Katsuragi Ace! It's Katsuragi Ace!! Pulling so far away from everyone, she comes in fiiiiiirst!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Did you see that!? How was that!? That was the result from following your instructions!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hahaa! We showed 'em! Don't you think!?
Katsuragi Ace was laughing impishly. Her sweat told the story of just how fierce it was.
choice_data_list: It's because of Katsuragi Ace's strength……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Then, that means this is OUR strength.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Which means……with both of our powers combined, there isn't a dream we can't fulfill! Ain't that right!?
……Saying that, she laughed again. I guess that means she's accepted me as a trainer.
choice_data_list: There's no way we can't fulfill them!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah! You got that right!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer-san. I will become the Uma Musume world's Ace, without a doubt. ……What's your dream?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Alright! Once again, looking forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: We'll show them that no dream is too big for us! Let's show all of them!
